item.title: My journey to getting Erasmus Mundus scholarship for SECCLO
item.description:
A lot of people asked me about this, so in this post I am sharing with you my experience in getting an Erasmus Mundus scholarship for the SECCLO program.

I graduated my bachelor’s

Hmm that’s pretty much it on this section. I graduated :)

I applied to Australia Awards Scholarship

A few months later, I tried applying for a scholarship. I was not aiming to get the scholarship, but rather to get the experience of applying for scholarships, so that I would get the hang of it. As expected, I did not get the scholarship, I did not even pass the first phase of the selection process.

item.title: Things to consider when writing motivation letter for scholarships
item.description:
There is no right or wrong in writing a motivation letter. In this post, I merely show you how I wrote mine which got me a scholarship.

First things first: Who am I & why should you trust me?

I was granted an Erasmus Mundus scholarship to pursue a Master’s degree in SECCLO, co-funded by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union.

I followed these guidelines you are about to read and I got the scholarship. But feel free to disagree!
